name: Wilderness Hunter
desc:
A ghoul that stalks the frozen wilderness when the pitch-dark mist rolls in. Their emergence presages worse calamities to come.
Many great champions of a lost ancient kingdom lie buried beneath the frozen northlands. Though the remnants of the past have been long wiped clean, these noble spirits yet defend their golden homeland. Awakened by Abyssal taint, these warriors now see all who trespass as prey.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Mistshroud Manifestation
dropMaterial.desc:
A chunk found in the mists of the Wild Hunt.
Like a snowflake forming from the air, it was created by the manifestation and solidification of dark power from another world.

dropMaterial.name: Mistshroud Plate
dropMaterial.desc:
A plate found in the mists of the Wild Hunt.
It was part of the armor of a Wild Hunt monster, but for some reason, it did not disappear with the mist.

dropMaterial.name: Mistshroud Helmet
dropMaterial.desc:
A helmet found in the mists of the Wild Hunt.
Perhaps because the sullying presence from beyond this world has fed from the memories of the Ley Lines, its shape appears oddly similar to the relics of a lost kingdom.

customize.text:
A ghoul corrupted by the taint of the Abyss, doomed to stalk the frozen wilderness for all eternity... Those who march beneath the banner of the Wild Hunt can only be truly defeated by reducing their Max HP to zero.
<color=#ffe14b>Drain its HP completely or use Skills enhanced by Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color> to send it into a brief Grief-Stricken state, during which, you can deal DMG to reduce its Max HP and suppress it completely!
